Yeah, I'm with you on that - today I was soo mad - mad because I can't tell if people are even being given the OPTION of trying the new drugs for #COVID19 #chloroquine & a #Zpack 
And I'm scared, because I don't want my children to have to fight for me to get it, God Forbid😬💊⚕️ https://t.co/2dxsj9C2FY https://t.co/XAxfgjhNoG
